subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
organizations: Billie Jean King National Tennis Center
lead_paragraph: The Open lets fans in free the week before the tournament to watch qualifying matches, but one of New York’s best-kept secrets is that the top players are also in attendance and practicing.
snippet: The Open lets fans in free the week before the tournament to watch qualifying matches, but one of New York’s best-kept secrets is that the top players are also in attendance and practicing.
